name: Crazy Farm : VRGROUND
description: 'VRGROUND: Crazy Farm' is a party game based on a clash between a farmer and animals who are stealing his apples. Farmer who is using VR(or PC) and animals who are using smart device can choose one of 3 game modes to play and enjoy together.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 , AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforece GTX970 , AMD Radeon R9 290 Storage: 400 MB available space
